backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting changes to Hero component feature pills (border and background opacity increases) with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, styling, and functionality of the Raavni Agrobyte/Milletmist website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Milletmist website with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that assembles all page sections (Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, Footer) with proper section IDs.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component featuring company story, team image, and four value cards highlighting women empowerment, quality, social impact, and natural goodness.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying three contact cards with address, email, and phone information plus a call-to-action message.
frontend/src/components/CoreTeam.tsx: Core Team section displaying four team member profile cards with images, names, roles, descriptions, and LinkedIn link placeholders.
frontend/src/components/FarmerSupport.ts: Farmer support section with farmer image, detailed description of ultra-poor farmer partnerships, and four impact cards showing direct partnership, sustainable income, training, and community building.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Raavni Agrobyte branding, copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with dynamic app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with background image, company logo, headline, feature pills (Natural Millets, Women-Led, Farmer Support), and CTA buttons for scrolling to products and about sections.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile menus, smooth scrolling to sections (home, about, team, products, farmer-support, contact), and active section highlighting based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section displaying two millet-based products (Protein Bar and Energy Boost) with images, descriptions, benefits badges, and a list of general millet health benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks to interact with backend; currently empty with export statement.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables for warm earth tones (terracotta, sage, amber), dark mode support, custom gradient utilities, and font family definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space, typography with Inter and Playfair Display fonts, custom animations (accordion, fade-in), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for Raavni Agrobyte/Milletmist website, listing implemented features including hero section, about us, products showcase, farmer support, team section, and contact form, with one known issue regarding footer logo display.
